name: unece-transport-status-codes
title: UNECE/CEFACT Trade and Transport Status Codes

licensces.name: ODC-PDDL-1.0
licensces.title: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License v1.0

description: Coded representations of the trade and transport codes used in International Trade (UNECE/CEFACT Trade Facilitation Recommendation No.24)

fields.name: Code
fields.description: A 2 character alpha numeric code value agreed by the UN/CEFACT content management group

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the status code

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A plain text specification of the named status code
